descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
XR BLOPSBounce is a vibrant physics puzzle experience built for fast, satisfying play. Each level is a unique 3D arena where your goal is simple: place panels, launch Blops, and create the perfect chain reaction.

As Blops bounce, slide, and collide through the arena, you earn currency, unlock upgrades, and access new challenges. Every arena introduces new layouts and interactions, pushing you to experiment with timing, placement, and strategy.

Start with basic cubes, then progress through increasingly complex shapes and structures — with new levels added regularly to keep the experience fresh.

Designed for quick sessions, intuitive controls, and endless replay value, XR BLOPSBounce turns simple physics into addictive fun.

Bounce smart. Bounce fast. Bounce everywhere.
